summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's A-Shaba Complex Eye Serum is a smoothing and moisturizing eye serum with a gentle but effective dose of 0.1% vegan retinol, 3% antioxidant-rich caffeine, and copper peptides that targets fine lines and wrinkles and reduces puffiness for a rested, more youthful appearance.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles in the eye areaAlleviates puffiness around the eyesIncreases moisture and improves elasticity for a rested, more youthful lookDermatologist TestedFormulated at a skin-friendly pH of 5.5Key Ingredients0.1% retinol: At a gentle 0.1% concentration, this pure form of vegan retinol can help improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles around the eye area, as well as ward off the free radical damage done by daily exposure to UV rays, pollution, and other environmental stressors3% caffeine: Caffeine has powerful antioxidant benefits for skin, and at higher concentrations (3% and above), it has the potential to alleviate puffiness around the eyesCopper tripeptide-1: Used for its powerful antioxidant properties and its ability to promote healthy collagen production (reducing the appearance of fine lines) and improve skin elasticityResearch ResultsIn a clinical study with 34 people after 8 weeks:97% of people showed improvement in undereye bags, crow's feet, and dark circles94% of people showed improvement in skin's textureIn a clinical study with 34 people after 4 weeks:88% of people showed improvement in skin's firmnessItem 2606314How To UseGently pat one pump under and around the eyes, including along the orbital bone, morning or night. Always use a broad-spectrum sunscreen.Tips:Leave A-Shaba Complex in the fridge for a cooling, skin-calming treatment.Mix with Ceramighty AF for deep moisture, soothing, and barrier-strengthening benefits.Pat a dab of Wonderwild on top of A-Shaba for even greater protection and repair.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with warm water.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Octyldodecanol, Glycerin, Boron Nitride, Caffeine, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Coconut Alkanes, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Niacinamide, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Bis(Tripeptide-1) Copper Acetate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Dipeptide-2, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Copper Lysinate/Prolinate, Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glucose, Biotin, Methylglucoside Phosphate, Retinol, Ceramide NP, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Lecithin, Cetyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Leontopodium Alpinum Meristem Cell Culture, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Ubiquinone, Citric Acid, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Steareth-20, Thioctic Acid, Tocopherol, Chrysin, Sclerotium Gum, Sodium Citrate, Polysorbate 20, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Laureth-23, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently pat one pump under and around the eyes, including along the orbital bone, morning or night. Always use a broad-spectrum sunscreen.Tips:Leave A-Shaba Complex in the fridge for a cooling, skin-calming treatment.Mix with Ceramighty AF for deep moisture, soothing, and barrier-strengthening benefits.Pat a dab of Wonderwild on top of A-Shaba for even greater protection and repair.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with warm water.

reviews.headline: DO NOT RECOMMEND
reviews.comments: I just started using this product a month ago and it has completely dried out my under eyes. I do not recommend this product especially for young girls. I know this product is the new "in thing" but it's not worth the money or worth drying your face out.

reviews.headline: Love this eye cream… the 1st one not to irritate my eyes
reviews.comments: Absolutely thrilled with this product by Drunken Elephant!  I'm 62 years old and know I should have been using an eye cream for years… this is the very first I've found that did not make my eyes burn.  Thank you, Drunken Elephant.

reviews.headline: The best Retinols for AM routine
reviews.comments: The Drunk Elephant retinols make my skin so happy! I use A-Passioni cream and the A-Gloel every day with a dollop of the A-Shaba on the eyes and I am good to go with a little spf. Keeps my skin feeling moist and smooth all day with no burn (I am not a retinol beginner).  Love these produxts, and yeah the funky smell and texture is because these are clean products instead of chemicals! ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.headline: Made under eyes look more aged
reviews.comments: Been using this for less than a week and my under eyes look more crepey and aged. This product produces a slightly burning sensation and overall I've experienced a loss of firmess ans drying as a result. Will be returning. Should have heeded the bad reviews.
reviews.nickname: Will age your under eye area

reviews.headline: Ok
reviews.comments: Purchased this product for fine lines and puffiness under eyes. After using for over a week I see no difference. Absorbs well feels light but I see no difference for the price

reviews.headline: New formula is better
reviews.comments: I used the original formula and it did nothing for me so I switched brands. The other brand redid their formula and added propylene glycol, which I'm allergic to. I went back to DE's updated eye cream and found it actually worked better than the previous version! I use it in the mornings and a different brand at night.

reviews.headline: I do not care for this product.
reviews.comments: It is not what I would like it to do.  It is not the product I came into the store to purchase, but the sales person convinced me it was far better.  I am not happy with this product at all.

reviews.headline: Irritated my eye area
reviews.comments: I returned this. I used it for a few days in a row, and it made the skin around my eyes irritated and itchy. I'm not sure whether it was was retinol or caffeine that irritated my skin.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love
reviews.comments:
Got this after reading all thr positive reviewe and some other drhnk elephant products. Unfortunaly this one made me wake up completly red under the eyes, with burning sensation! Stopped usuing immediatly and was left with peely undereyes! 
Be careful with this product !!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love the way it leaves my eyes feeling

reviews.headline: Painful
reviews.comments: Ive been using this product for a week now which i figured is a good timeframe for a review. Usually before using this, i clean my face with a make up remover towel and ever since using this, it feels so irritated and painful under the eyes that i can't wipe my face without feeling like glass is shredding my under eyes.

reviews.headline: Worst eye cream; burned my skin
reviews.comments: I do not have sensitive skin and can tolerate a lot of products without reactions. This is the absolute worst, and it has damaged my undereyes! It burned my under eyes, and made my under eyes rough and bumpy. I will be returning this ASAP!!!

reviews.headline: No changes yet
reviews.comments: So far I haven't noticed and changes, good or bad. I'm only 23 so I started using this to hopefully combat the wrinkles that will inevitably form around my eyes. I constantly have dark circles that are more pronounced with how pale my skin is. The product itself does not cause any irritation for me and a little goes a long way. I use it nightly along with other DE products.

reviews.headline: burned the skin around my eyes
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this, but after 2 weeks of using it I just kept getting more irritated. I felt like I had a chemcial burn. it was awful.

reviews.headline: Don't Recommend
reviews.comments: Maybe it's because I have somewhat sensitive skin, but this dried out the skin around my eyes. My skin burned and even peeled after using consistently for a week or two. Pretty disappointed since it's so expensive, and I'm unable to use it.

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: It does what it says it does  and it makes my eyes like nice  I love

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Gifted by drunk elephant. First of all, I LOVE the packaging. I also like how this eye cream is thin but still feels very hydrating. I have sensitive eyes but this eye cream doesn't make my eyes water or sting.

reviews.headline: burns!
reviews.comments: sadly de ruined a good thing by adding caffine and retinol to an already fine eye serum. causes chemical burns and irritation

reviews.headline: Do not recommend
reviews.comments: Burn my skin!

reviews.headline: Do not buy unless you want dry, red under-eyes!
reviews.comments: My daughter used this product for 3-4 days and woke up with puffy, red eyes where she had been applying it. The skin started to peel and her under eye area was very dry and irritated. After 2 days of not using, the skin started to clear up. Buyer beware!

media.headline: ACTUALLY reduces fine lines and crows feet!
I used to have really bad eyebags. In ever since I used this
Amazing under eye cream- helps with fine lines.
Great standalone eye product
media.caption: Top: before; Middle: after (morning after use); Bottom: with makeup

media.headline: Didn't see much of a difference
media.caption: Before and After, using serum day and night for a week

media.headline: Finally a DE eye cream I love!
It has helped to look more awake!
media.caption: Love it

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this product for a little over a month and I have been super impressed with the results. I have tried loads of high and anti-aging eye creams, and I finally found the one for me! I enjoy the non-sticky formula and the results I am getting. You twist the top of the bottle to expose the pump, which I love! The bottle seems to be lasting a long time, making it even more cost effective. Finally found my holy grail eye cream! Seriously, just add it to the cart already😍😂
faceoff_positive.headline: ACTUALLY reduces fine lines and crows feet!

faceoff_negative.comments: Bring back the original, this product is terrible for people with sensitive skin. It dries out your eyes, makes them look dehydrated and my lines look ten times worse than they ever have. It also burns! I use a thin layer every few days! I do not recommend! The original was 1000 times better! I used it for years and I miss it like crazy after not having it for 1 month. Why change a perfect product?
faceoff_negative.headline: Bring back Shaba
